title: Add Loading Screen Chat
body: I think you should add a loading screen chat before game starts so that we can talk to our team or to the others on the opposing team about the new champs or about strategy before the game starts just a suggestion.

replies.body: I would like it and I think this has already been suggested multiple times but whether it will ever be implemented is anyone's guess.

Yes, I think that would be pretty cool.
I don't see why not.
noty, I want as little communication with my team as possible.
